meanings.definition: A window that projects vertically from a sloping roof.
meanings.sent1: The dormer in the attic let in plenty of sunlight.
meanings.sent2: I love looking out of the dormer window to see the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The birds built a nest right outside the dormer, creating a cozy home.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like dormer windows, always bright and welcoming.
meanings.sent5: The dormer framed the view of the garden like a picture on the wall.

meanings.definition: A room built into a sloping roof.
meanings.sent1: The dormer in the house was turned into a cozy reading nook.
meanings.sent2: We converted the dormer into a small office space with a great view.
meanings.sent3: The dormer room became the favorite hideout for the kids during hide-and-seek.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a dormer, filled with stories and dreams waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The dormer room felt like a secret sanctuary above the bustling house.
